title: PETA Demands 'Ten Vegan Commandments' Be Put In Public School Classrooms
description:
The left often turns random idols into God. They do this because leftism is literally a religion. And most people can agree that the worst group among progressives is probably vegans. This is why PETA has decided to make its own version of the “Ten Commandments” because they think they know better than God.

But it’s worse than all that because they are also trying to push it in Oklahoma school classrooms.

title: Watch: Elderly man's brain freezes up, needs a reporter to remind him what Hamas is
description:
The leader of the free world tried to give a speech but failed miserably as he froze up for forty seconds because he could not remember how to say "Hamas".

— (@)

"There is some movement, and I don’t wanna, I don't wanna, let me be choose my words — there's some movement. There's been a response from the, uh, there's been a response from the opposition, but um…,” Biden said, according to RNC research.

At this point, we are just glad he was able to get out of bed.

A reporter had to finish his sentence for him as he desperately tried to remember the name.

title: Biden aides pressured Amazon to REMOVE BOOKS they deemed to be “Misinformation”: report
description:
Progressives are the champions of psychological projection, as they often accuse people of what they are guilty of. For quite some time now the Biden Administration has been slandering conservatives by claiming that many people are trying to “ban books'' in schools. Everyone reading this knows that that couldn’t be further from the truth. But as I said, they subsequently berate everyone around them for the very things they are guilty of. This is why white house aids worked with Amazon to censor books related to “vaccine misinformation”.


— (@)

title: Appalling Video Shows Moped Gang Of Illegals Drag Elderly Woman Along Street
description:
Police shared an appalling video Monday of a migrant on a moped dragging an elderly woman along a New York City street all because he wanted to steal her phone. The suspect in the video is connected to a moped gang that has been stealing wallets and cell phones from at least 62 women across NYC.

title: Watch: Namesake of “Tiara’s Law” Hosts All Ages Drag Event Featuring 14-Year-Old Dancing with Sex Doll For Cash Tips
description:
Mug Club Undercover has obtained disturbing footage regarding Tiara's law and the people pushing it.

A Colorado state bill would make it easier for felons who want to receive gender-affirming care to legally change their names. Currently, felons must show good cause to be able to change to a name different from the name the person was convicted under. This is because it makes it harder to find out information about someone once they change their name.

If the law passes, “good cause” would include changing one’s name to align with one's “gender identity”

title: Watch: Joe Biden declares war on Snickers. No, really. This is where we're at as a country.
description:
Joe Biden needs to eat a Snickers. Because he gets a little dementia when he's hungry.

The president of the United States is running out of scapegoats to blame for his policies ruining America. So now he is going after Big Chocolate. See, your Snickers bar has gotten smaller while he has been president. And it's all the fault of shrinkflation. Or, greedflation. He's on a kick where he puts words in front of -flation. title: Toby Keith, patriot and county music icon, loses his battle with cancer at age 62
description:
Gutted to wake up to the news this morning of Toby Keith, 62, passing away after a battle with stomach cancer. His family made the announcement on his social media platforms that he passed peacefully on February 5th, sounded by his family, fighting his fight with grace and courage until the very end.

Of course, the way Instagram's algorithm works, the next time I opened the app up I saw this post from the day before of Toby's last performance, about "getting back at it" after the end of another weekend.
